short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enable focus mode on Chrome Extension and Web Store documentation

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Just a test extension so I can learn about the deployment process. The code itself is the "Inject scripts into the active tab" tutorial from https://developer.chrome.com/docs/extensions/get-started/tutorial/scripts-activetab.
